title: event_descriptor
description: Document to describe the data captured in the associated event documents

data_keys.title: Data Keys
data_keys.description: This describes the data stored alongside it in this configuration object.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: The timestamps of the individual measurement data

DataKey.title: DataKey
DataKey.description: Describes the objects in the data property of Event documents

dims.title: Dims
dims.description: The names for dimensions of the data. Null or empty list if scalar data

dtype.title: Dtype
dtype.description: The type of the data in the event.

external.title: External
external.description: Where the data is stored if it is stored external to the events

object_name.title: Object Name
object_name.description: The name of the object this key was pulled from.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Number of digits after decimal place if a floating point number

shape.title: Shape
shape.description: The shape of the data.  Empty list indicates scalar data.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source (ex piece of hardware) of the data.

PerObjectHint.title: PerObjectHint
PerObjectHint.description: The 'interesting' data keys for this device.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: The 'interesting' data keys for this device.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Readings of configurational fields necessary for interpreting data in the Events.

data_keys.title: data_keys
data_keys.description: This describes the data in the Event Documents.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-friendly name for this data stream, such as 'primary' or 'baseline'.

object_keys.title: Object Keys
object_keys.description: Maps a Device/Signal name to the names of the entries it produces in data_keys.

run_start.title: Run Start
run_start.description: Globally unique ID of this run's 'start' document.

time.title: Time
time.description: Creation time of the document as unix epoch time.

uid.title: uid
uid.description: Globally unique ID for this event descriptor.
